 2008-13782008-07-28,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActJudges Act
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. LYNN B. MacDONALD, a Judge of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench for Saskatchewan, from August 1, 2008 until January 31, 2009, on account of ill-health.
